channel.title: uh on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in uh on Barefoot Rob

item.title: back to UH
item.description: experiencing University of Houston 25 August 1998 Yesterday my friend Sarah invited me to say HI to her at 4pm at Camp Guerin at University of Houston. I was almost embarassed that I had to ask, "which one is Camp Guerin?" (She told me it's the one by PGH.) "Oh yeah!" So today I took a nap and perfectly woke up at 3:40 and drove out to UH. Wow. Nostalgic feelings rushed toward me at 60 miles per hour on the highway.
